org.apache.spark.scheduler.local

Class LocalBackend

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.scheduler.local.LocalBackend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.spark.executor.ExecutorBackend, SchedulerBackend

    public class LocalBackend
extends Object
implements SchedulerBackend, org.apache.spark.executor.ExecutorBackend
    LocalBackend is used when running a local version of Spark where the executor, backend, and master all run in the same JVM. It sits behind a TaskSchedulerImpl and handles launching tasks on a single Executor (created by the LocalBackend) running locally.
